channel.title: Help me plz? <3
channel.description: Just like to kick this off by saying Hello and Thank You greatly to anyone whose able to help me here, as I'm eager to start this as soon as I can. - - - I have been searching for a while now for a decent place to start creating my own Runescape Private Server and have yet to find a good point to begin. If anyone could point me into the right direction to where I should be at would be amazing. I guess I'm asking for a basic step by step guide~ If that's possible? I'm so stumped right now, Please help me? <3 :)

item.title: Help me plz? <3
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

idk why everybody on this thread are posting random links, the op clearly wants to make his own not use anybody else’s otherwise he would of said so?

http://docs.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/
Learn Java, about networking (mainly client/server applications), do a lot of research, figure out how the client works by looking through the code blah blah blah maybe use another server as a reference to help you out for which case the server downloads section should help. https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,49.0.html

If you just want to be another kid that’s gonna download a ‘premade’ server’ idk why you need help downloading and pressing run.

Read full topic

item.title: Help me plz? <3
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

eclipse.org

Eclipse Downloads | The Eclipse Foundation

The Eclipse Foundation - home to a global community, the Eclipse IDE, Jakarta EE and over 350 open source projects, including runtimes, tools and frameworks.


moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars


[/quote]
Sorry, Is there something specific I should be looking for on the Server Downloads. or just anything that appeals to me? O.o[/quote]
Anything that appeals to you. I recommend a 317 server.
Also, get Eclipse for Java developers.

I have been searching for a while now for a decent place to start creating my own Runescape Private Server and have yet to find a good point to begin. If anyone could point me into the right direction to where I should be at would be amazing.
